select mi.id, mi.code, mi.cause, mi.user_id, mi.check_issuer, mi.check_agency, mi.status, mi.create_date, mi.order_code, mi.symptom, di.doctor_name, di.doctor_img, di.images as doctorImages, hi.hospital_name, hi.hospital_img, hi.images as hospitalImages, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages from medication_info mi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = mi.user_id) left join doctor_info di on (di.id = mi.check_issuer) left join hospital_info hi on (hi.id = mi.check_agency) where 1 = 1
AND mi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{medicationInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{medicationInfo.userName},'%')
AND di.doctor_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{medicationInfo.doctorName},'%')
AND hi.hospital_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{medicationInfo.hospitalName},'%')
order by create_date desc
